view

类 GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GameModel

  • public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for modeling the game surface with equal-sized blocks.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static byte black
      A color.
      private int blockHeight
      The height in pixel of a screen block.
      private int blockWidth
      The width in pixel of a screen block.
      static byte blue
      A color.
      private byte[][] box
      The modelisation of the game surface.

      A color.

      Copies another model on this model.

      Sets the color of the circumference of a rectangle in the model.

      Sets the color of a filled rectangle in the model.

      Sets the color of a block of the model.

      Sets the color of an horizontal line in the model.

      Sets the color of a vertical line in the model.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameModel

        public GameModel(int gameWidth,
                 int gameHeight,
                 int blockWidth,
                 int blockHeight)
        Constructor: records the parameters and allocate the box array of byte.
        参数:
        gameWidth - The width of the game in blocks.
        gameHeight - The height of the game in blocks.
        blockWidth - The width in pixel of a screen block.
        blockHeight - The height in pixel of a screen block.

    • 方法详细资料

      • paintGame

        public final void paintGame(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paints the model on the graphics g.
        参数:
        g - The Graphics object.

      • get

        public final byte get(int w,
                      int h)
        Gets the color of a block of the model.
        参数:
        w - X coordinate of the block.
        h - Y coordinate of the block.
        返回:
        color of the block.

      • set

        public final void set(int w,
                      int h,
                      byte b)
        Sets the color of a block of the model.
        参数:
        w - X coordinate of the block.
        h - Y coordinate of the block.
        b - color of the block.

      • setHLine

        public final void setHLine(int w,
                           int h,
                           int width,
                           byte b)
        Sets the color of an horizontal line in the model.
        参数:
        w - X coordinate of the first block.
        h - Y coordinate of the first block.
        width - width of the line.
        b - color of the line.

      • setVLine

        public final void setVLine(int w,
                           int h,
                           int height,
                           byte b)
        Sets the color of a vertical line in the model.
        参数:
        w - X coordinate of the first block.
        h - Y coordinate of the first block.
        height - height of the line.
        b - color of the line.

      • drawRectangle

        public final void drawRectangle(int w,
                                int h,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                byte b)
        Sets the color of the circumference of a rectangle in the model.
        参数:
        w - X coordinate of the upper left-most block.
        h - Y coordinate of the upper left-most block.
        width - width of the rectangle.
        height - height of the rectangle.
        b - color of the circumference of the rectangle.

      • fillRectangle

        public final void fillRectangle(int w,
                                int h,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                byte b)
        Sets the color of a filled rectangle in the model.
        参数:
        w - X coordinate of the upper left-most block.
        h - Y coordinate of the upper left-most block.
        width - width of the rectangle.
        height - height of the rectangle.
        b - color of the filled rectangle.

      • copy

        public final void copy(GameModel gameModel)
        Copies another model on this model.
        参数:
        gameModel - To be copied.
